程序包 org.apache.jmeter.threads

类 JMeterThread

java.lang.Object
org.apache.jmeter.threads.JMeterThread
所有已实现的接口:
Runnable, Interruptible
public class JMeterThread extends Object implements Runnable, Interruptible
The JMeter interface to the sampling process, allowing JMeter to see the timing, add listeners for sampling events and to stop the sampling process.

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Set running flag to false which will interrupt JMeterThread on next flag test. This is a clean shutdown.

    • interrupt

      public boolean interrupt()
      Interrupt the current operation if possible.
      指定者:
      interrupt 在接口中 Interruptible
      返回:
      true if there was an operation to interrupt.
